content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good to meet you, Nesibe. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. What do you have in mind for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the best possible price for the apartment. I am a student and I want to be responsible with my finances. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Understood. I appreciate your desire to be responsible with your finances and maintain a good relationship with me. Based on the size of the apartment and my expectations for the rental market, I am willing to consider a rental price of 1500 Euros per month. Is this something you can agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That sounds good to me. I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month. Thank you for considering me as a tenant.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I'm glad to hear that you are willing to agree to the rental price of 1500 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before we finalize the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
